name: @janhq/huggingface-extension
description: Hugging Face extension for converting HF models to GGUF
author: Jan <service@jan.ai>

scripts.download:llama:linux: LLAMA_CPP_VERSION=$(cat ./scripts/version.txt) && download https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/archive/refs/tags/${LLAMA_CPP_VERSION}.tar.gz -o . --filename ./scripts/llama.cpp.tar.gz && tar -xzf ./scripts/llama.cpp.tar.gz --wildcards '*/convert.py' '*/convert-hf-to-gguf.py' '*/gguf-py' && cpx "./llama.cpp-$LLAMA_CPP_VERSION/**" "scripts" && rimraf "./scripts/llama.cpp.tar.gz" && rimraf "./llama.cpp-$LLAMA_CPP_VERSION"
scripts.download:llama:darwin: LLAMA_CPP_VERSION=$(cat ./scripts/version.txt) && download https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/archive/refs/tags/${LLAMA_CPP_VERSION}.tar.gz -o . --filename ./scripts/llama.cpp.tar.gz && tar -xzf ./scripts/llama.cpp.tar.gz '*/convert.py' '*/convert-hf-to-gguf.py' '*/gguf-py' && cpx "./llama.cpp-$LLAMA_CPP_VERSION/**" "scripts" && rimraf "./scripts/llama.cpp.tar.gz" && rimraf "./llama.cpp-$LLAMA_CPP_VERSION"
scripts.build:publish:linux: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && npm run download:llama && cpx "scripts/**" "dist/scripts" && cpx "bin/**" "dist/bin" && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../pre-install
scripts.build:publish:darwin: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && npm run download:llama && cpx "scripts/**" "dist/scripts" && cpx "bin/**" "dist/bin" && ../../.github/scripts/auto-sign.sh && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../pre-install
scripts.build:publish:win32: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && npm run download:llama && cpx "scripts/**" "dist/scripts" && cpx "bin/**" "dist/bin" && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../pre-install
